title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs with Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
Drain pasta and quickly toss it with pancetta and egg-cheese mixture.
Serve immediately while hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Creamy tomato-based curry with tender marinated chicken pieces.

instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, turmeric, and garam masala for 1 hour.
Sauté onions until golden, add canned tomatoes, and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add marinated chicken and cook until tender.
Stir in cream and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Vegetarian Tacos
summary: Crispy tacos filled with seasoned beans, veggies, and avocado.

instructions: Heat taco shells in the oven as per package instructions.
Sauté red bell pepper in a pan and mix with black beans.
Fill taco shells with bean mixture, lettuce leaves, avocado slices, and salsa.
Enjoy immediately!

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Rich and creamy beef and mushroom sauce served over egg noodles.

instructions: Cook egg noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté onion and mushrooms until tender.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Sprinkle flour, stir, and add beef stock.
Simmer until thickened and stir in sour cream.
Serve over egg noodles.

title: Caprese Salad
summary: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

instructions: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella into even rounds.
Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices on a platter, alternating each slice.
Add fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and season with salt and pepper.
Serve chilled.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Garlicky and buttery shrimp served with pasta or crusty bread.

instructions: Cook pasta as per package instructions, if using.
Melt butter in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3 minutes per side.
Stir in lemon juice and parsley.
Serve over pasta or with crusty bread.

title: Ratatouille
summary: Delicate layers of baked vegetables with herbs and olive oil.

instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Layer the sliced vegetables in a baking dish, alternating each type.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with herbs.
Cover with foil and bake for 40 minutes.
Uncover and bake for another 10 minutes to caramelize the top.

title: Banana Bread
summary: Moist and flavorful bread made with ripe bananas.

instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mash bananas in a bowl and mix with sugar and eggs.
Add flour, baking soda, and salt, and mix until combined.
Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan.
Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy breakfast favorite topped with syrup and fruits.

instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda.
In another bowl, whisk together milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, and mix until smooth.
Heat a greased skillet and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles appear, flip, and cook until golden.
Serve with maple syrup and fruits.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with gooey chocolate chips.

instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Cream butter, sugars, and vanilla extract in another bowl.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then gradually add the flour mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Burrito
summary: Two breakfast burritos with scrambled egg, sausage and tomato in a tortilla wrap

instructions: Cook sausage in a pan until browned.
Whisk eggs, season with salt and pepper, and scramble them in the same pan.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet.
Fill tortillas with scrambled eggs, sausage, tomato, and cheese.
Roll into burritos and serve warm.

title: Fruit Juice
summary: Various colourful fresh raw ingredients and already blended mix in a bottles for individual consumption are on the kitchen table surface

instructions: Peel and chop the oranges, apple, carrot, and spinach.
Add all ingredients to a blender.
Blend until smooth, adding water or ice cubes for desired consistency.
Pour into bottles or glasses and serve fresh.
